mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE bNo = #{bNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT cmNo, bNo, uid, uNickName, cmRef, cmStep, cmRefOrder, cmAnswerCount, cmParentNo, cmContent, cmInsertDate, cmUpdateDate, cmDeleteDate, cmRec, cmUnrec, cmDeleted FROM comment WHERE bNo = #{bNo} ORDER BY cmRef ASC, cmRefOrder ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(uid, uNickName, bCgNo, bTitle, bContent, bInsertDate) VALUES(#{uid}, #{uNickName}, #{bCgNo}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET bViewCount = bViewCount +1 WHERE bNo = #{bNo}
UPDATE board SET bDeleted = 1, bDeleteDate = now() WHERE bNo = #{bNo}
UPDATE board SET bTitle = #{bTitle}, bContent = #{bContent}, bUpdateDate = now() WHERE bNo = #{bNo}
